title: Inorganic Chemistry
description: A study of the reactions and structures of inorganic compounds and principles, generalizations and theories that assist in understanding their behavior.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 2312 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 2313 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
